content: Fight carefully, and take note of which of his rake attacks swing fast, vs the ones that take time to swing around to dodge at the right times, or have a focus point in reserve to use a Thrust Stance varied combo and get out of his attack range.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Zhu Bajie (Second Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
Fight carefully, and take note of which of his rake attacks swing fast, vs the ones that take time to swing around to dodge at the right times, or have a focus point in reserve to use a Thrust Stance varied combo and get out of his attack range.
